title: Understanding Data Anonymization
text: Data anonymization involves modifying data to protect individual identities. It ensures that personal information cannot be traced back to a specific person.

hintAnswer: by removing or altering personal identifiers to prevent tracing back to an individual
title: Mechanism of Data Anonymization
text: Data anonymization helps in safeguarding personal information by removing or altering personal identifiers to prevent tracing back to an individual.
choices: by removing or altering personal identifiers to prevent tracing back to an individual
by encrypting data with a complex algorithm
by storing data in a secure location
